name: Ext_R4B_Consent_policy
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Consent.policy for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.policy from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope. Policies may be organizational, but are often defined jurisdictionally, or in law.
element.comment: `Consent.policy` maps to R5 `Consent.policyBasis`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Entity or Organization having regulatory jurisdiction or accountability for  enforcing policies pertaining to Consent Directives.
element.comment: `Consent.policy` maps to R5 `Consent.policyBasis`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Entity or Organization having regulatory jurisdiction or accountability for  enforcing policies pertaining to Consent Directives.
element.comment: `Consent.policy` maps to R5 `Consent.policyBasis`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Specific policy covered by this consent
element.definition: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope. Policies may be organizational, but are often defined jurisdictionally, or in law.
element.comment: `Consent.policy` maps to R5 `Consent.policyBasis`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
